short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamingoceans Default Search allows you change and set your default search engine in the easiest and simpliest way.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamingoceans Default Search is a free browser extension that enables you to change your default search engine to the one that is different from your default search engine so you would enjoy custom search experince powered by Bing.

By clicking “Add to Chrome”, you accept and agree to install the Streamingoceans Default Search Chrome extension, set the Chrome Default Search to Streamingoceans Default Search powered by Bing, and adhere to the Terms and Privacy Policy.

How it works:
1. Under the Streamingoceans Default Search extension settings select from a few top search engines.
2. Once you have chosen your default search engine, your Omni bar (address bar) searches will be done through the default search engine that you have chosen.
3. Enjoy a simple and easy way to update and search different search engines to get the most precise search results.

Visit our website at https://streamingoceans.com/
Read more about us: https://streamingoceans.com/about/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://streamingoceans.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms and Conditions: https://streamingoceans.com/terms-conditions/
Uninstall Instructions: https://streamingoceans.com/uninstalling-a-chrome-extension/

If at any point after installing Streamingoceans Default Search, you feel it is not right for you, don’t worry about it! There are two simple ways to uninstall the extension.

Removal Instructions One:
Step 1: Right click on the extension in the top right corner of your browser.
Step 2: Click ‘Remove’

Or

Removal Instructions Two:
Step 1: Click on the three dots/horizontal lines icon in the top right corner of your Chrome browser.
Step 2: Go to "Settings".
Step 3: On the left-hand side, click on ‘Extensions’
Step 4: Find the extension that you wish to remove and click the ‘Remove’ button.
Step 5: The extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
